subject: Quotation Request: Laboratory Services Inquiry from {{name}}
html:
Dear Admin,

You have received a new quotation request for laboratory services from {{name}}.

Client Details:
  Inquiry ID: {{inquiryId}}
  Name: {{name}}
  Affiliation: {{affiliation}}

  Email: {{email}}

Workflows Involved:

Please review the details and prepare a quotation accordingly.


Best regards,
Quotation Request System

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
